items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their fitness activities and achievements with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can select an activity and share it to their social feed within the app
Shared activity displays date, type, duration, and distance
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities
non_functional: Response time for sharing activity should be under 2 seconds

items.title: Friends List Management
items.description: Allow users to add, remove, and view friends to connect with other app users.
acceptance_criteria: User can search for other users by name or email
User can send and accept friend requests
User can remove friends from their list
non_functional: Friend search results should return within 1 second

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made about core fitness tracking and authentication features already existing. Social features are prioritized for engagement.
